abstract: The arrest of a man accused in a sexual attack on a woman in Brooklyn appears to be the first breakthrough in a crime spree that has placed several neighborhoods on edge.
snippet: The arrest of a man accused in a sexual attack on a woman in Brooklyn appears to be the first breakthrough in a crime spree that has placed several neighborhoods on edge.
lead_paragraph: A Sunset Park man was arrested early Wednesday in a sexual attack on a young woman. The episode was the latest in a series of attacks that have alarmed Brooklyn communities from Park Slope to Bay Ridge since March.

headline.main: Sunset Park Man Is Arrested in Groping Attack
